column6:
An alternate Earth's existence hangs in the balance as Psylocke must face the brainwashed Exiles, who are now slaves of the Hand and on a deadly and destructive path. This world's Sue Storm and Wolverine promise to make things NOT better!,2007,3
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | inker:Rick Magyar | penciller (cover):Paul Pelletier | colorist:Wil Quintana | letterer:Dave Sharpe
